name: Staggering Blow
summary: You've trained your megafauna companion to stagger its enemies, impeding their ability to fight back.
description:
You've trained your megafauna companion to stagger its enemies, impeding their ability to fight back. You Command an Animal to order your megafauna companion to spend both its actions making a single, powerful Strike. The attack deals an extra die of weapon damage, and if the attack hits and deals damage, the target is slowed 1 until the end of its next turn.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
